description:
This proof documents the start of farm activities on 22 December 2025 at MaMeeFarm, marked by a morning environmental condition record.

The image captures a digital thermometer and humidity meter installed on a brick wall, showing real-time readings at 06:50 AM (GMT+7).
The recorded values indicate a cool early-morning temperature and high relative humidity, reflecting typical seasonal conditions in rural northern Thailand.

This activity represents the first operational action of the dayâ€”establishing environmental context before any physical labor begins.
Such records provide baseline atmospheric data essential for understanding farm conditions, animal behavior (when present), crop health, and human workload.

The data is recorded as-is, without manipulation or enhancement, in alignment with DGCP principles of ground-truth evidence, temporal integrity, and continuity of daily records.

This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
